name: The Burger Game
description:
Make delicious hamburgers in your very own hamburger shop! Earn lots of money and stars in order to progress your building and serve hamburgers with more ingredients. There are 3 game modes: Story, Competition, and Rush Hour.

Progress, compete & see how fast you can make hamburgers in this ever exciting hamburger game! It's fun and free for the whole family to enjoy. What are you waiting for? Become the most famous burger chef around!
